alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 7:26PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hendry and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 800 PM EST... At 726 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Lake Harbor, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, and Fremd Village-Padgett Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
